Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR that are not dismissed

Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
